item.title: Color
item.description: Primary color palette The full color palette provides a wide range of colors. Three colors should be used at the primary colors which are aliases for colors within the color palette: Brand Base data Base interactive Status OK Status Alert Status Warning "Brand"/sky-100 - Brand is the primary color, matching the OpenAQ logo color "Base data"/lavender-100 - Base data is the primary color for data, charts, etc "Base interactive"/ocean-100 - Base interactive can be used as a secondary color for data, charts etc and as a interactive color "

item.title: Typography
item.description: Space Grotesk is the primary font face used in the OpenAQ design system. Text color should default to smoke-120 when on a white background, but other colors can be used in different circumstances with appropriate semantic meaning and visible contrast. https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Space+Grotesk Display 1 Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Subtitle 1 Subtitle 2 Subtitle 3 Body 1 Body 2 Body 3 Body 4 Body 5 Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 Link 4 Link 5
